# flowgraph Documentation Index

> Go library for graph-based LLM orchestration with checkpointing, conditional branching, and multi-model support.

## Quick Start
- CLAUDE.md (160 lines) - Project overview, key patterns, quick reference
- docs/OVERVIEW.md (250 lines) - Vision, core concepts, use cases

## Architecture
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md (450 lines) - System design, type definitions, execution model
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md (350 lines) - Complete public API documentation

## Implementation
- docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md (280 lines) - Porting from Python, common patterns
- docs/GO_PATTERNS.md (300 lines) - Go idioms, gotchas, production patterns
- docs/TESTING_STRATEGY.md (400 lines) - Test patterns, coverage requirements

## By Topic

### Graph Definition
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#graph-builder - AddNode, AddEdge, SetEntry, Compile

### Execution
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md#execution - Run algorithm, checkpointed execution

### Checkpointing
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md#checkpoint-stores - Memory, SQLite, Postgres stores

### LLM Clients
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md#llm-clients - Claude CLI, Mock, interface

### Testing
- docs/TESTING_STRATEGY.md - Unit tests, integration tests, coverage
